summary: This mod lets you summon a horse!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://oi45.tinypic.com/33jlm9z.jpg[/img][/center]

[center]Featured on [url={http://www/gametillinsane.com/}]GameTillInsane.com[/url]
[img]http://oi46.tinypic.com/16a74hj.jpg[/img][/center]


This great mod gives you power to summon a steed at your fingertips!

Spell Tome Location: On the shelf near the counter in Warmaiden\'s located in Whiteun!

/Future Updates/
- All kinds of steeds

-Installation-
You can be download with either DMM or manually


Created by Yankster
author: Yankster
